attributes.action: TRAIN NURSES ON WARDS AND NOT IN A CLASS ROOM
attributes.additional_details:
Nurses need to go back to training on the wards,feeding and giving personal care, this will teach them how to care. classrooms are not the place to learn how to care.
I would go back to the 1980/1990s when the NHS gave a fantastic service. I have a son with very complex needs but we dread him having to go into hospital these days.
